column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I'm really not a huge fan of deep dish (sorry Chicago) but it is a great spot to take visitors and has
column3: been my go to. They do not take reservations
column4: it is busy literally every single night
column5: and you have to stop by
column7: and stay within 5 minutes to receive a table. The only reason I give it 4 stars as opposed to 5 is because of the incredibly inconvenient system. Let a girl make a reservation! Other than that the pizza is pizza and everyone I have taken there has enjoyed it.
